entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is mentioned as someone who was looking for Harry. He has an entourage.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is described with red hair and horn-rimmed glasses. He is part of Scrimgeour's entourage.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who gave no sign that he was aware of Percy.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe and Goyle are described as hulking boys muttering together at the Slytherin table.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as a tall, pale figure who was bossing Crabbe and Goyle around. He had fear in his voice on the Tower top.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone Harry has animosity towards.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who was killed.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as making Malfoy do something under threat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned throughout the text.
